title: Organic Growth With MariMed
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: MariMed is a vertically integrated multi state cannabis operator. CEO Bob Fireman joins Rena Sherbill to discuss why he thinks they're undervalued. Giving guidance, changing messaging and cleaning up balance sheet from previous debt. Full legalization and uplisting closer but still far off - that's the game changing moment. Protecting the creators of the industry, not wanting to become one of the bad guys. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
